        factory =
        ChannelViewModelFactory(

            QuerySort.desc("last_updated"),
            Filters.and(
                Filters.eq("type", "messaging"),
                Filters.`in`("members", listOf(ChatClient.instance().getCurrentUser()?.id ?: ""))
            )
        )
    ), lazyListState: LazyListState = rememberLazyListState(), onLastItemReached: () -> Unit = { viewModel.loadMore() }, onChannelClick: (Channel) -> Unit = {}, onChannelLongClick: (Channel) -> Unit = { viewModel.selectChannel(it) }, loadingContent: () -> Unit = { LoadingIndicator(modifier) }, emptyContent: () -> Unit = { DefaultChannelListEmptyContent(modifier) }, emptySearchContent: (String) -> Unit = { searchQuery ->

            modifier = modifier
        )
    }, helperContent: BoxScope.() -> Unit = {}, loadingMoreContent: () -> Unit = { DefaultChannelsLoadingMoreIndicator() }, itemContent: (ChannelItemState) -> Unit = { channelItem ->

            channelItem = channelItem,
            currentUser = user,

            onChannelLongClick = onChannelLongClick
        )
    }, divider: () -> Unit = { DefaultChannelItemDivider() })
